quotes.quote: We have self-centered minds which get us into plenty of trouble. If we do not come to understand the error in the way we think, our self-awareness, which is our greatest blessing, is also our downfall.
The shortest short-term investment is to serve ourselves.
Your ability to see will never broaden when you only see yourself.
Self centered people have only one topic to talk about ...themselves.
He was like the cock who thought the sun had risen to hear him crow.
If you live your life as if everything is about you, you will be left with just that. Just you.
Love in the service of self is greed in disguise.
An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself.
God sends no one away empty except those who are full of themselves.
To be an end in myself is to bring an end to myself.
You will never find a truly happy self-centered person. They simply don't exist.
You don't deserve a point of view, if the only thing you see is you.
When a man is all wrapped up in himself he makes a pretty small package.
To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
One is not necessarily made self-centered because he is foolish, but one is very often made foolish because he is self-centered.
